clinical_study.brief_title: Relationship Between Blood Glucose Variability and Prognosis in Critically Ill Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Relationship Between Blood Glucose Variability and Prognosis in Critically Ill Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate the glycemic variation using Continuous Glucose Monitoring System in patients in the intensive care unit, find out the occult hypoglycemia, and investigate the relationship between glycemic variation, especially the incidence of hypoglycemia and prognosis of patients. Meanwhile, the inflammatory factors were measured and the relationship between inflammatory factors and glycemic variation.
